CustomField.description: Green: Buy-in on savings report value & Clear differentiation & Passed security and compliance || Yellow: Wants to see move savings or Thinks other tools can do it or Unsatisfied security issues || Red: We’ve failed Technical / Security review or customer not excited by Savings Report

CustomField.label: Product Fit
